NEW refrigerator, NEW dishwasher, NEW Stove/Oven,', 'NEW Microwave, NEW Laminate Flooring and so much more.', 'It sits minutes from the 10 freeway and Western Ave, granting access to anywhere you might want to go.', ' The University of Southern California is just a few miles away.', 'Parks, shops, restaurants and markets are all in close proximity.', 'Come and take a look at what this wonderful studio has to offer, it will not be available for long.', '-New Kitchen Cabinets', '-Wall heating unit', '-Tons of Natural Light', '-Appliances Included: NEW Stove, NEW Garbage Disposal, NEW Refrigerator, NEW Microwave & NEW Dishwasher', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Ample amount of Kitchen Cabinets', '-Large Living Space', '-Wall Heating Unit', '-Large Closet', '-NEW Laminate flooring throughout', '-Combo', 'Shower/Tub', '-Tiled shower', '-New Bathroom Fixtures', '-NEW Window Coverings', '-Recessed Lighting', '-Mirrored Closet Doors', '-Controlled Access Building with Intercom', '-Portable A/C Unit (Not Pictured, will be included)', '-1 Assigned Parking Spot', '-Utilities Included: Water and Sewer', '-Laundry Facilities on site', '-Pets Allowed with $600 Pet deposit and a $25 monthly fee', 'Visit the following link for a video tour of the unit:', '<URL>', '**Please visit <URL> to apply**', '- Details:', 'Type:', 'Studio/1Bath', 'Bedrooms:', '0', 'Pets:', 'Yes', 'Total Area:', '375 Sq Ft', 'Bathrooms:', '1.0', 'Smoking:', 'No', 'Number of Floors:', '1', '- Terms:', 'Deposit:', '$1,695.00', 'Min.', 'Lease:', '12 Months', 'Available:', '07/14/2022', 'Other Charges:', 'Electricity, Gas, Trash & City Fees', '- Unit Amenities:', 'Pets Allowed', 'Apply on Web-Site: <URL>', 'Cable-ready', 'Air Conditioning', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Assigned Parking = 1', '- Building Amenities:', '- View All My Listings:', 'To view our listing, copy and paste the following into your browser window:', '<URL>', '- Contact Us:', 'Alliance Property Management', 'show contact info']
